message: So I've been trying to figure out what to use as my ORM caching solution. There seems to be a bunch of options listed on Django Packages (http://djangopackages.com/grids/g/caching/) but I'm not sure what one to go with. Johnny Cache's table level invalidation is too aggressive for me, django-newcache doesn't seem maintained / updated anymore, django-cache-machine seems undjango-like.
What does everyone use? Recommendations? Suggestions? Tips?
From Andy McKay's talk at EuroDjangoCon, I know that addons.mozilla.org (which is a pretty huge site) uses cache-machine.
For a summary of Andy's talk, see http://reinout.vanrees.org/weblog/2011/06/06/large-mozilla-sites.html . I also wrote down cache-machine in my to-check-after-the-conference talk.
